articles.author: Maggi Marshall
articles.title: Nearly 800,000 people are impacted by strokes a year. These are the signs you should look out for. - CBS 6 News Richmond WTVR
articles.description: The American Heart Association finds that one in four adults over the age of 25 will have a stroke in their lifetime.
articles.content:
RICHMOND, Va. Oct. 29 is World Stroke Day, a day created to bring awareness to the medical event that impacts nearly 800,000 people annually. 
Doctors find that strokes can impact people of all ages… [+2288 chars]
